reviews.content: Works like Apple put it there themselves! Amazing UI and backup settings! Sometimes it can be a bit buggy though, especially when moving icons but otherwise grade a+++ stuff!
Screen acts like its a third of its size. No iPad 5 12.4 Unc0ver IPAD compatibility
Great tweak for those sexy homescreen setups you see on twitter and reddit. Other tweaks provide the same functionality but this is one of the only ones to update live before your eyes
Working on unc0ver iOS 12.4. Moving icons can be buggy sometimes
Works great on my iPhone XS Max iOS 12.1.1
Working great! Better than having a tweak to move around icons, this is a much cleaner approach!
On A12 Max xs 12.1.1 the horizontal padding isnâ€™t working properly, the rest is fine ??
Does everything I need it to do
XS Max, grid is screwy. Can't figure out how to get it to work.
